faq.question: How do i enable tag completion?

answer.p: Tag completion is planned for the second release which will be called XPontus 1.0.1.

faq.question: How to request/get some new features?

answer.p: You can contribute or request it at the forum pages.
As there is no stable release I am always developing, I code, I don't sleep :-). Request something and I will reply as soon as I get time to do so..
I didn't find a nice and free alternative to edit XML files at the time.

faq.question: Is there a Mac OS X installer?

answer.p: It is planned... I don't own a Mac but I will find the time and the experts to help build it.
The feedback is very important to me to improve the editor. I am trying to write a roadmap but without comments I might forget obvious things.

faq.question: Can I undo changes after HTML cleaning?

answer.p: No. I didn't find a way to do it, I am still looking at the problem.

faq.question: How do i download only the source code?

answer.p: Go at the project download page and follow the instructions to get the code from the SVN repository.
